data.text:
@Gianina_Natoli And the flexibility given to dads too. There’s still too much assumption (by everyone!) it’s mums only. 
I worked at a place that actually gave men up to 6 weeks parenting leave. When one guy took it, the women in the office ridiculed him!

@Gianina_Natoli God forbid, your child should get *really sick
I mean, 2 weeks in pediatric ICU sick
that stays with you for a long long time
and it is not good, evenwhen they turn out fine
